popover.title: New to Regex Generator
popover.description: Hi! It looks like you're new to Regex Generator. Let us show you how to use this tool.

popover.title: Sample
popover.description: In the first step we need an example, so please write or paste an example of the text you want to recognize with your regex.

popover.title: Recognition
popover.description: Regex Generator will immediately analyze your text and suggest common patterns you may use.

popover.title: Suggestions
popover.description: Click one or more of suggested patterns...

popover.title: Result
popover.description: ... and we will generate a first regular expression for you. It should be able to match your input text.

popover.title: Language snippets
popover.description: We will also generate snippets for some languages that show you, how to use the regular expression in your favourite language.
